description: The S3 Image service uses a number of custom metadata for tracking state (owner, image_location, is_public).  These should be moved into base image service and main glance attributes where possible.  It also does custom filtering, which also should be done at a lower level.  This will probably require related work in glance.
title: S3 Image Service needs cleanup and better glance integration.
